summary: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.
cast: Richa Chadha|Sanjay Mishra|Vicky Kaushal|Pankaj Tripathi|Vineet Kumar|Bhagwan Tiwari|Singh Bhupesh|Satya Kam Anand|Saurabh Chadhary|Mohit Abrol|Deepak Agarwal|Harsh Agarwal|Manish Agrahari|Jamal Ahmad|Ana|Aalok Bhat|Amitabh Bhattacharya|Shreedhar Dubey|H.S. title: Masaan
